short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will grab the data from the selected Jira task, and copy it to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple tool for people who need quick access to Jira ticket names on a regular basis.

Maybe you're using the task name for client billing, appending the info in a commit message, or simple sharing the name with a coworker. Whatever the case, it can be tedious to fetch the task data by hand.

Jira Grabber is a simple tool which quickly grabs the selected task key and title from Jira and saves it to your clipboard.
